content.question: Which of the following best explains why feminists of the time might have been skeptical of the message shown in the advertisement?

choices.label: Feminists sought more freedom to pursue careers and education outside of the home.
Feminists saw that despite new freedoms they were still expected to fulfill traditional domestic roles as well.
Feminists were largely more supportive of communism than capitalism as a means of gaining new freedoms.
Feminists were more interested in pursuing suffrage and political change than in changing social values.

content.answer: Feminists saw that despite new freedoms they were still expected to fulfill traditional domestic roles as well.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
